title: not recieving loot box after S- or better
body:
hello, 

problem number one: i noticed that in a few games got a S- or more and did not receive a box.

problem number 2: league crashes after first attempt in opening the hex-tech page.

can someone look into this?

Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Can you link me the matches you earned a S- or better after confirming you have hextech chests available in your summoner profile?

(click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/dVCkn

Additionally, a lot of players mention their Hextech Crafting crash being resolved after either updating Plays.tv or disabling/uninstalling it altogether. Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for reply all chest are available telling me this been going on for a while and I didn't notice. By the way is there a way to know what grade you got after post game lobby?

The only one I'm sure was my last game but I defetnitly have more recent ones. 

Here's my last one:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2272698281/216639294?tab=overview

At the moment, there's no way to check your grade for a specific match after you've left the post-game lobby for it. 

This match wasn't quite an S grade but was pretty close. A great resource to check and ensure you're eligible for earning a chest is our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Then you check for me at least my last 5 wins, I'm sure I have qualified.

It looks like you have already earned a chest on the champs you've recently played. Since you're only able to earn one chest per champ, per season, you may want to play a wider pool of champions to earn more chests. Earning a chest on a champion, even if you aren't the one who earned the S (it can be anyone in your premade) will count toward your chest on that champ for the season.

Let me know if this cleared it up for you.

Could that (checking your grade) be implemented? I understand there might be concerns of 'shaming' people if they don't do sufficiently well, and saying "oh you got a C, you suck", but I figure that only showing S+, S, S-, or Not S would get around that.
Also to note that you cannot receive a chest multiple times from a single champion during a Season. Not sure if you were aware, but just putting it out there.
Did not know that, will have to teSt it out with a champ I have never gotten one with
